description: Blending technical fabrics with everyday style, the Trovat T-Shirt can do it all. Made with recycled polyester and organically grown cotton, this soft and breathable tee dries quickly and wicks moisture, keeping you cool and dry on hot and humid days. Raglan sleeves prevent pressure points with a backpack. From relaxed hikes to mountain tours, and down time off the mountain, this technical tee has you covered.
name: Mammut Trovat T-Shirt Logo - Mens

specs.value: enhanced wicking, drying, and comfort with natural and synthetic fibers
